summary: Arabella is a daughter of the world's most terrifying pirate captain. She loves her father but also dreams about a life of a usual girl. One day a weird stranger is saved from the sea who ... See full summary »
cast: Inga-Kai Puskar-Polonski|Lembit Peterson|Urmas Kibuspuu|Raivo Trass|Leelo Spirka|Lembit Ulfsak|Aarne Üksküla|Sulev Luik|Endel Pärn|Ilmar Tammur|Ants Ander|Tõnu Kark|Arvo Kukumägi|Georg Jansin|Jaan Kiho|Priit Pärn|Heino Seljamaa|Arno Saar|Heino Mandri|Voldemar Paavel|Paul Poom|Gea Sibola|Väino Laes|Ivo Eensalu|Helme Rattas|Reet Paavel|Kaarel Papagoi|René Rekand|Rafail Beltshikov|Arvo Iho|Olev Paakspuu|Margit Meikar|Kristiina Smith|Sille Paimets|Siiri Sisask
title: Arabella, mereröövli tütar
